title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. I, pt. 15 - Procedures For Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act
content:

§ 15.8 - Procedures for funding and permit-granting where the department is not the lead agency

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. I, pt. 15

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §
8-0113[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
